result.reason: Adding default external tools (Ping, Traceroute, etc.) improves the out-of-the-box experience and utility for new users.
result.approach: Modify ExternalAppsLoader.LoadExternalAppsFromXML to populate a wider range of default tools (Ping, Traceroute, etc.) when the configuration file is missing or empty, likely by extending the AddBuiltInShellPresetIfMissing method to support categories and other properties.
